message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and interests. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, I estimate its value to be $12,000 to me. Considering its worth to you is $8,000, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and a dedicated support package. I hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. Looking forward to your positive response.
